General.Name: Zhejiang Damon Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Damon Technology Group Co.,Ltd. research, develops, manufactures, sells, and services automated logistics solutions in China and internationally. The company offers carton, pallet, vertical, overhead, belt, and pulley conveyor series; and cross belt, sliding shoe, swivel wheel, narrow belt, split tray, and swing arm sorting machines, as well as electrical roller transfer and skewed wheel diverter machines. It offers storage and pick up equipment; goods handling machines; and develops software, such as warehouse management and control software, inventory management system, sort directory system, AGVS scheduling system, supervisory control and data acquisition system, and PHEGDA system. The company's products are used in e-commerce, express delivery, intelligent manufacturing, textiles, pharmaceutical, tobacco, supermarket retail, cold chain, and other industries. Damon Technology Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Huzhou, China.

5.Name: Mr. Guohua  Dai
5.Title: Director of Parts Technology Department of Logistics Technology Research
